edu.cmu.cs.relab.tortoise

Class DataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.cs.relab.tortoise.DataSource

  • public class DataSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a naive reader for CSV files to acquire privacy risk score data.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    CMU RELAB

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(int row,
                            java.lang.String header)
        Returns the desired value in the given row and header name.
        Parameters:
        row - the row containing the desired value
        header - the header name describing the desired value
        Returns:
        the desired value

      • read

        public static DataSource read(java.io.File file)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a data source that assumes a comma delimiter. The delimiter is assumed to separate values in each row of the file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file containing the data
        Returns:
        the data source acquired from the given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown, if an error occurs reading the given file

      • read

        public static DataSource read(java.io.File file,
                              java.lang.String delim)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a data source using the given delimiter. The delimiter is assumed to separate values in each row of the file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file containing the data
        Returns:
        the data source acquired from the given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown, if an error occurs reading the given file

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of rows in this data source.
        Returns:
        the numer of rows in this data source.
